roleset.name: board, reside in a room

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: Hallie and I decided it 'd be best for us to room together , and Alexa had plans to room with our friend Ellen .... but then Alexa decided that NO , she wanted Hallie that day and made my life hell

roleset.note: ROOM-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from room.01-v)
